content.en: Lung sound analysis: Computerized lung sound analysis, employing algorithms and machine learning techniques, can aid in the detection of abnormal lung sounds. Various techniques and algorithms are used in computer-based respiratory sound analysis to analyze and classify respiratory sounds. Machine learning algorithms are important in computer-based lung sound analysis as they help in the identification and classification of different pulmonary dysfunctions. These algorithms can also be used to improve the diagnosis of diseases like chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and pneumonia through automated lung sound analysis.
content.da: Lunge lydanalyse: Computeriseret lunge lydanalyse, der anvender algoritmer og maskinlæringsteknikker, kan hjælpe med at opdage unormale lungelyde. Forskellige teknikker og algoritmer bruges i computerbaseret respirationslydanalyse til at analysere og klassificere respirationslyde. Maskinlæringsalgoritmer er vigtige i computerbaseret lunge lydanalyse, da de hjælper med at identificere og klassificere forskellige lungedysfunktioner. Disse algoritmer kan også bruges til at forbedre diagnosen af sygdomme som kronisk obstruktiv lungesygdom (KOL) og lungebetændelse gennem automatiseret lunge lydanalyse.
